Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Regency Plaza is located in the busy Northeast retail corridor at the SEC of Nellis Blvd. & Stewart Ave. Over 80,000 cars drive past this intersection daily. Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Eastern Crossing retail center is located in Henderson, Nevada along the Eastern
Corridor adjacent to the main/main intersection of St. Rose Parkway and Eastern
Avenue. The Eastern Corridor is the main traveled north/south road with easy I-215
Beltway access to major retailers, restaurant tenants, office/medical corridor and master planned residential communities.

The residential communities & commercial corridor serviced by this property
include Anthem Country Club, Seven Hills and Silverado Ranch master planned
communities, the new St. Rose Dominican Hospital - Siena Campus, Steinberg
Diagnostic, and major medical, dental and specialty care providers.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Eastern Crossing retail center is located in Henderson, Nevada along the Eastern
Corridor adjacent to the main/main intersection of St. Rose Parkway and Eastern
Avenue. The Eastern Corridor is the main traveled north/south road with easy I-215
Beltway access to major retailers, restaurant tenants, office/medical corridor and master planned residential communities.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
- Located minutes from McCarran International Airport and visible from the I-15 freeways, the center is the perfect location for the over 42 million annual visitors* to Las Vegas (*Source: Las Vegas Convention and Visitors Authority)

- Largest hotel market in in the U.S. with nearly 150,000 hotel rooms

- Nevada’s pro-business tax structure offers no personal state income tax, a lower cost of living, and an expanding labor pool

- Unprecedented population growth in Clark County from 461,816 residents in 1980 to over 2.2 million in 2018 (Source: Clark County Department of Comprehensive Planning, report date: July 30, 2018)

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Town Square Las Vegas is a shopping, dining and entertainment center on Las Vegas Boulevard at the junction of I 15 and the 215 Beltway. The 100-acre, openair center features 26 buildings detailing a collage of Old World and contemporary architectural styles with over 115 stores and restaurants, an 18-screen movie theater and 252,000 sq. ft. of class A office space.

- 355,000 SF of Class A office space (Tesla, Amazon, WeWork, Regus…) creating a daytime employment audience of over 1,350 persons

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: A vibrant shopping, dining and entertainment center in the heart of Las Vegas, NV.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Downtown Summerlin is part of a planned urban center, serving the entire Las Vegas Valley. It includes retail, entertainment, office, hotel and multifamily residential elements, all designed to create a vibrant, walkable urban core within the award-winning 22,500-acre Summerlin master-planned community. Downtown Summerlin totals nearly 400 acres and features more than 125 stores and restaurants in the streetscape-shopping environment with pedestrian thoroughfares and dynamic storefronts.
